introduction: SYNOPSISDae-bin and Hyung-ju go on TV date program and meet Na-young and Jung-ae, respectively. Hyung-ju loves Jung-ae but hesitates between the two women. Dae-bin goes for Jung-ae and Hyung-ju ends up at Na-young's apartment. After Dae-bin and Jung-ae's engagement Jung-ae finds Hyung-ju and spends the night in his room. They take a trip to Nami island resort and gets a boat accident which killed her and Hyung-ju paralyzed. Later, Dae-bin marries Na-young but she doesn't trust his love. Finally, Hyung-ju regains consciousness to confess that he loved Jung-ae. Na-young turns to her husband.故事Daebin和他的兄弟们出现在青年列车上，和Na Young和Jae Ae见面。他喜欢Jayeong，但比较两者，找出Dae Bin和Jee Je的关系。在大斌和宰爱订婚之后，宰爱带着微妙的感情走到了他的姐夫家，并与他相爱。弟弟和宰爱在纳米岛烧两个爱，在船事故中，宰爱死亡，兄弟变成了蔬菜。后来，达宾和那年结婚照顾了兄弟，但那杨却不相信达宾的爱情。最后，嫂子恢复了意识，意识到他真的爱他的朋友，而不是他自己。
